meanings.sent1: Her face looked blotchy after spending too much time in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The artist used different shades of paint to create a blotchy effect on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The blotchy pattern on the puppy's fur made it look like a little spotted teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: The sky was a blotchy canvas of pink and orange as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The blotchy appearance of the old photograph made it difficult to make out the faces clearly.

meanings.definition: Marked by irregular patches of color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The old wall had a blotchy paint job with patches of different colors showing through.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a blotchy texture due to the uneven dyeing process.
meanings.sent3: The blotchy design on the cake made it look like a delicious work of art.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a blotchy carpet of fallen leaves and sunlight filtering through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The blotchy appearance of the map made it challenging to distinguish the different regions.
